sentence.Network_en: When circularly polarized light is used, the cross may be eliminated.
sentence.Network_cn: 用圆偏振光时, 这十字就可以消失.

sentence.Network_en: All the other wavelengths will emerge as either elliptically or circularly polarized light.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有其它波长的光将以椭圆偏振光或圆偏振光出射.

sentence.Network_en: The transforms of disks and rings and the like will obviously be circularly symmetric.
sentence.Network_cn: 圆盘和圆环等的变换式显然将是圆形对称的.
